verbose_text: In summary, we have identified a novel tobacco EMS mutagenesis induced premature leaf senescence mutant controlled by a recessive single gene and have preliminarily mapped the causal gene to an interval between PT53066 and PT60305 on the tobacco LG11, with the genetic distance of 1.08 and 3.51 cM, respectively.
evidence: EMS mutagenesis induced premature leaf senescence
